quotes.quote: All growth is a leap in the dark, a spontaneous unpremeditated act without benefit of experience.
If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
We are spontaneous when we are at our genuine best.
Spontaneity is being present in the present.
The spontaneous is the most beautiful thing that can appear in a picture, but nothing in art appears less spontaneously than that.
Intent is a tool, not an obstacle, to seek spontaneity.
Our spontaneous action is always the best. You cannot, with your best deliberation and heed, come so close to any question as your spontaneous glance shall bring you.
No matter how many plans you make or how much in control you are, life is always winging it.
Better to be spontaneous and wrong than be cautious and right every single time.
Be spontaneous, be creative, go out and have fun, let things happen naturally.
If you are always trying to be normal, you will never know how amazing you can be.
Plans are invitation to disappointment.

Being spontaneous is being able to respond with confidence; calmly trusting that, whatever the outcome, you will have a positive if challenging experience that will lead to greater self-awareness and success.
Unplanned moments are always better than planned ones.
Through spontaneity we are re-formed into ourselves.
Spontaneous kindness is to hipsters as high beams are to deer.
If everything was planned, it would be dreadful. If everything was unplanned, it would be equally dreadful.
You can't be spontaneous within reason.
Being spontaneous at times is a must. Being spontaneous all the time is a crazy person.
Spontaneous actions of individuals, aiming at nothing else than at the improvement of their own state of satisfaction, undermined the prestige of the coercive status system step by step.
Spontaneity is a meticulously prepared art.
